Text:
@S3nd41,
Sorry mate; The wife and I find this UL to be, in the words of the immortal Sheriff Andy Taylor, Juuust Fiiine.
On my 24" monitor the video is crystal clear, which is obviously the intention of the ULer.
I see no claims about HD, DVDRip, Blu-Ray, 720p, 1080p, or any other sort, by the ULer.
You may note it is listed, quite correctly, in TV Shows, not in DVDrip, nor in Hi-Res, which means we have no right to expect whatever standard of perfection you desire, then rag on it cuz it does not meet same.
Lighten up, my friend.
V=10
A=10
Thx again, mcdirty20! Plz keep em coming!
Cheers, all!
